description: Canonical definition of all governance-critical oversight parameters. Parameters are grouped for automated system auditing and modular loading by the Oversight Parameter Registry (OPR).

P01_RISK_FLOOR.description: Maximum permitted deviation ratio from the measured baseline risk index (RBI).

MAX_ENTROPY_DEBT.description: Threshold for initiating forced self-correction and internal stabilization procedures.

SANDBOX_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) for independent, unverified code execution sandbox processes.

E05_MAX_GENERATION_CYCLES.description: Maximum self-evolutionary generation attempts (cycles) allowed for a single objective before aborting or reverting.

G10_GOVERNANCE_AUDIT_INTERVAL_HRS.description: Interval for mandatory full governance ledger audits.
